summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General memorandum documenting the transfer of custody of evidence from the OIG to the FBI on October 17, 2024. The evidence relates to OIG Case Number 2019-010614 and includes cloned DVR system hard drives from the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, audio equipment, and forensic analysis materials.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Provided final disposition approval for the evidence transfer from the OIG to the FBI.

connections.person2: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: SA received final disposition approval from the Assistant U.S. Attorney before transferring evidence to the FBI.

events.title: Evidence Transfer to FBI
events.description: Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General transferred custody of evidence related to OIG Case 2019-010614 to the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

events.title: Evidence Custody Documentation (Logs 20, 21)
events.description: DOJ OIG Form III-234/1 Evidence Custody Document was created for Logs 20 and 21.

events.title: Evidence Custody Documentation (Logs 31-34)
events.description: DOJ OIG Form III-234/1 Evidence Custody Document was created for Logs 31, 32, 33, and 34.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Evidence from DOJ OIG Case 2019-010614 was transferred from the Office of the Inspector General to the FBI on October 17, 2024.
The transferred evidence includes cloned DVR system hard drives from the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, indicating surveillance footage was collected.
The evidence disposition required approval from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The document references FBI Laboratory forensic analysis including fingerprint analysis related to the evidence.
The case number 2019-010614 suggests the OIG investigation began in 2019, potentially related to events at MCC New York.
